DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study was to compare peak serum anti-D levels (Cmax) of BPL's D-Gam速 1500 IU to Rhophylac速 1500IU in RhD-negative healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing the Pharmacokinetics and Tolerance of D-Gam速 to Rhophylac速 in Rh-D-negative Healthy Volunteers.
DOC.criteria: Females Ages of 18 and 55 years Bodyweight of 5085kg. Clinically relevant abnormalities at physical examination, ECG or laboratory tests.
